title: Health Facility Data Portal
text:
This portal provides clean, structured, and reusable health facility data extracted from official facility profile PDFs.
The dataset is designed to support: - Disease modelling (e.g.Â malaria, HIV) - Spatial accessibility analysis - Health systems research - Program planning and evaluation
